channel.title: IKEA on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in IKEA on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: IKEA - made in India
item.description: It is no secret that I am a big fan of IKEA’s clean cut design. And now every time I go outside of India try to pick something from there. Wished we got the whole modular kitchen, beds, chest of drawers, leather sofa while moving back from Paris. This time I visited IKEA store was next to Newark Airport(EWR, NJ) and picked some small stuff for Aarush. When a neighbour looked at the “Made in India” level asked from which store we picked up?
